architectural_notes: Timer interaction: touch-and-hold arms the timer; timer starts on release (not while holding).
Timer logic: countdown from 15 to 0; 8s warning and 5s warning (with sound). At 5 it should announce '5 sec'.
Result rules: 0 to -2 counts as +2; anything past -2 is DNF.
known_issues: Inspection/timer countdown not progressing after touch-and-hold release.
8-second and 5-second warning indicators/sounds not triggering as expected.

existing_features.title: Fix the inspection countdown so it visibly counts down from 15.00 to 0.00 during inspection after the user triggers inspection with a press-and-hold, and ensure the countdown continues updating every frame until inspection ends or the solve starts (no freezing at 15.00).

Implement the inspection warning behavior so that at 8 seconds remaining there is a warning, and when inspection reaches 5 seconds remaining it visibly shows "5 sec" and plays the 5-second warning sound; both warnings must reliably trigger once per inspection.

Ensure touch/hold and Spacebar controls follow: the timer starts only after the user releases (not while holding) once armed; during inspection, holding again arms and releasing starts the solve timer.

Apply inspection penalty rules exactly as requested: inspection display counts down to 0.00 (not below), but starting the solve up to 2 seconds after inspection hits 0.00 results in a +2 penalty; starting after that results in DNF.

projectName: Fix WCA inspection countdown progression and 8s/5s warnings; ensure start-on-release and +2/DNF timing rules
